header.title: erl_expand_records

description.p: This module expands records in a module.

func.fsummary: Expand all records in a module.

desc.p: Expands all records in a module to use explicit tuple operations and adds explicit module names to calls to BIFs and imported functions. The returned module has no references to records, attributes, or code.
